mapper.insert:
insert into hr_person (person_id, persom_number, last_name_cn, first_name_cn, last_name_en, first_name_en, middle_name_en, english_name, gender, email_address, person_type_id, seeded_person_type_key, user_person_type, location_id, location_code, location_name, mob_phone_number, bank_name, bank_branch_name, bank_sub_branch_name, bank_account, effective_start_date, assignment_status_type, action_code, travel_subsidies, department_id, department_code, department_name, job_id, job_code, job_name, manager_id, manager_num, manager, legal_entities_id, legal_entities_code, legal_entities_name, company_name, actual_termination_date) values
(#{item.personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.persomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.firstNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.firstNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.middleNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.personTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.seededPersonTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userPersonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.locationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankSubBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.effectiveStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.assignmentStatusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.actionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.travelSubsidies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.jobCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.managerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.legalEntitiesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.legalEntitiesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.legalEntitiesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.actualTerminationDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
